```{r}
fold_data <- readRDS("reports/results/models_and_evals/glmnet:::MODE_PRESENCE:::LABEL_H:::SYMP_TRUE:::CV_TRUE/data_info.rds")
```

```{r}
all_tests <- readRDS("all_tests.rds")
```

```{r}
all_tests %>% dplyr::transmute(.pred_good = glmnet, Class = RISK) %>% cal_plot_breaks(Class, .pred_good, num_breaks = 10)
all_tests %>% dplyr::transmute(.pred_good = rf, Class = RISK) %>% cal_plot_breaks(Class, .pred_good, num_breaks = 10)
all_tests %>% dplyr::transmute(.pred_good = nb, Class = RISK) %>% cal_plot_breaks(Class, .pred_good, num_breaks = 10)
all_tests %>% dplyr::transmute(.pred_good = ensemble, Class = RISK) %>% cal_plot_breaks(Class, .pred_good, num_breaks = 10)
```
